title: Cody's Journey as Director
author: Cody
preview: A lot of people just go through the motions. They do what other people expect of them and they believe what other people say. I fell into that rut my first two years of college. I didn't have anything I felt personally motivated by or anything really capturing my attention. That all changed in spring 2017.

title: Aerodynamics Team Progress Update: Week of 9/27
author: Cody Biedermann
preview: On Monday, the Aerodynamics Team met to discuss several factors in designing the outer shell of our next solar-powered car, Fenrir, including the core materials, the design, and a test model for the mold of the outer shell. The team is in the process of creating a design of the shell in SolidWorks.

title: Vehicle Dynamics Team Progress Update: Week of 10/11/24
author: Cody Biedermann
preview: The Vehicle Dynamics team is currently engaged in developing various structural components for the car’s chassis. A current focus is on welding pedal mounts that will secure the acceleration and brake pedals. Sean, Solarpack’s technical director, is leading the effort to ensure the welding process is secure.

title: High Voltage Team Progress Update: Week of 10/18
author: Cody Biedermann
preview: The High Voltage team has worked on getting the batteries ready for all of Fenrir’s different systems. Although their primary focus was on the batteries, the team also worked on the motors for the brakes and accelerators, along with the coding for the thermistor (a device that checks temperature).

title: SolarPack Subteam Updates - Week of 2/23
author: Cody Biedermann
preview: Aero, Business, High Voltage, Low Voltage, Structures, and Vehicle Dynamics teams share their latest updates and next steps for the week of 2/23. Read on for highlights from each subteam!

title: Vehicle Dynamics Team Update - Week of 3/24
author: Cody Biedermann
preview: Watch as the Vehicle Dynamics team speaks on their progress and experiences working on Fenrir, our solar-powered car for the 2025 Formula Sun Grand Prix!
